name: American Customer Satisfaction Index, LLC
description: American Customer Satisfaction Index (ACSI) is a leading provider of customer satisfaction measurement and benchmarking in the United States. Founded in 1994, ACSI has established itself as a trusted resource for businesses, government agencies, and academia to understand and improve customer satisfaction across various industries. ACSI employs a unique methodology that combines survey data and statistical analysis to provide actionable insights into customer experiences and behavior. Their annual reports and indices cover a wide range of sectors including retail, e-commerce, healthcare, and more, offering clients the ability to compare their performance against industry benchmarks. ACSI’s mission is to enhance customer satisfaction, loyalty, and business performance through data-driven insights. The company’s focus on providing detailed and accurate metrics helps organizations make informed decisions that positively affect their customer relationships and overall profitability.
